Memory[ 0] = 32'B00001000000000010000000000000110; // addi	$ra $zero 6
Memory[ 1] = 32'B00001000000111110000000000111000; // addi	$sp $zero 56
Memory[ 2] = 32'B00010100000000000000000000000011; // jump	main
Memory[ 3] = 32'B00110000000000000000000000000000; // nop	main
Memory[ 4] = 32'B00100000010000100000000000000000; // in	$a0  
Memory[ 5] = 32'B00011100000000100000000000000000; // sw	$a0 0($zero)
Memory[ 6] = 32'B00100000010000100000000000000000; // in	$a0  
Memory[ 7] = 32'B00011100000000100000000000000001; // sw	$a0 1($zero)
Memory[ 8] = 32'B00011000000101010000000000000001; // lw	$s1 1($zero)
Memory[ 9] = 32'B00011100000101010000000000000010; // sw	$s1 2($zero)
Memory[10] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000001; // addi	$t0 $zero 1
Memory[11] = 32'B00011100000010000000000000000011; // sw	$t0 3($zero)
Memory[12] = 32'B00110000000000000000000000000000; // nop	L0
Memory[13] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000000; // addi	$t0 $zero 0
Memory[14] = 32'B00011000000101000000000000000010; // lw	$s0 2($zero)
Memory[15] = 32'B00111110100010000100100000000000; // sbt	$t1 $s0 $t0
Memory[16] = 32'B00101001001000000000000000011010; // beq	$t1 0 L1
Memory[17] = 32'B00011000000101000000000000000011; // lw	$s0 3($zero)
Memory[18] = 32'B00011000000101010000000000000000; // lw	$s1 0($zero)
Memory[19] = 32'B00000010100101010101000000000010; // mult	$t2 $s0 $s1
Memory[20] = 32'B00011100000010100000000000000011; // sw	$t2 3($zero)
Memory[21] = 32'B00001000000010000000000000000001; // addi	$t0 $zero 1
Memory[22] = 32'B00011000000101000000000000000010; // lw	$s0 2($zero)
Memory[23] = 32'B00000010100010000100100000000001; // sub	$t1 $s0 $t0
Memory[24] = 32'B00011100000010010000000000000010; // sw	$t1 2($zero)
Memory[25] = 32'B00010100000000000000000000001100; // jump	L0
Memory[26] = 32'B00110000000000000000000000000000; // nop	L1
Memory[27] = 32'B00011000000101010000000000000011; // lw	$s1 3($zero)
Memory[28] = 32'B00001110101000100000000000000000; // move	$a0 $s1 
Memory[29] = 32'B00100100010000000000000000000000; // out	$a0  
Memory[30] = 32'B00010100000000000000000000011110; // halt
